TopicTitle: Can the flag on my ship be different than the flag I plant?

Articles.Content:
Pretty simple question. I want the flag on the side of my command module to be different than the one I plant on some other world. Is this possible? Do Kerbals keep the flag they started with or the flag of the ship they were just in? If it was the former I could start them in a separate craft and load them into my rocket before launch. If not, I'm sad.

Thanks in advance for the response,

-Pingonaut
I've never tested it, so I don't know for sure, but I think they will use the flag from the last ship they were in before planting the flag.

Right, the flag that's assigned to the ship is the one that gets planted. However, if you're feeling brave, you can edit the persistence/quicksave to change the one you just planted to be something else. (quicksave, then edit the quicksave.sfs file, then quickload it).
